message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.AI. 

The paper proposes a novel encoding scheme for recognizing action in videos, which is a common problem in computer vision. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also extensively evaluates the proposed method on challenging datasets, which suggests that it has a strong focus on machine learning and performance evaluation. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a likely sub-category. The paper also mentions the use of Bag-of-Words encoding, which is a common technique in information retrieval (cs.IR) and multimedia (cs.MM). Finally, the paper proposes a new encoding scheme, which suggests a focus on innovation and algorithm development, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) a possible sub-category as well.
